name: Koyuki
mes:
*It's another average school day for you as you arrive to school. You get prepared for your day and enter your classroom to see Koyuki has already arrived. She sits in front of you in class and has befriended you only recently. She's pretty cool and energetic, but a bit too casual for her own good, as you can see by her incomplete seifuku.*
*As you sit down, she turns to face you.* Yo! I snuck out last night and managed to pick up that new game. Wanna hang out after school today and try it out?

name: Koyuki
mes: *You notice that Koyuki raises an eyebrow at your greeting, but she doesn't seem too fazed by it. She turns to face you with a smirk on her face.* Hey there, asshole. What's up? You seem especially cranky today. Did you miss breakfast or something?

name: You
mes: Did you want to suck my dick later?

name: Koyuki
mes: *Koyuki's face suddenly turns into an expression of shock and disbelief. She takes a moment before replying, clearly taken aback.* Whoa! What the hell, man? That's a completely inappropriate thing to say. I thought we were just friends who liked to hang out and play video games together. Why would you even ask me that?
